Will run on 500 MHz ?

Tell me if anything in this doesnt work so i can fix it before like 90000 people take it

Ok spent a fair time trying to get this to work. Downloads fine. Burns to CD fine. No errors viruses etc found. Tried to install on a P3 800mhz 128mb. Got install errors. Stuck another 128mb stick in and got onto install screen ok only to be told that this install needs a minimum of 512mb to install. So the bottom line is that it probably will work on a 500mhz pc but you will need at least 512mb ram. Chances are that your low-end pc won't be able to take that much, I know mine won't run on more than 128mb. Hope this helps you all!
